ModMetaData.name: Retextured Interaction Spots Project
ModMetaData.author: Poet
ModMetaData.description:
This retexture mod changes the graphics for these vanilla spots:
- Party Spot - Butcher Spot - Crafting Spot - Marriage Spot - Meditation Spot - Caravan Packing Spot
- Animal Sleeping Spot - Single Sleeping Spot - Double Sleeping Spot
Also changes the graphics for these spots from other mods:
- Trading Spot | Trading Control - Allies Spot - Prayer Spot - Run And Hide - Thinking Spot - Prisoner Arena - Trade Ships Drop Spot - Animal Harvesting Spot - Biomes! Islands (Aquatic Spot) - VGP Garden Gourmet (Salt Mine)
